# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="a535c-102">在 Outlook.com 中答复</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a535c-103">若要一次答复一封邮件, 请执行以下操作:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a535c-104">在邮件列表中, 选择要答复的邮件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="a535c-105">在邮件窗格的右上角, 选择</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a535c-106">**答复**或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a535c-107">**全部答复**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="a535c-108">键入您的消息, 然后选择 "**发送**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a535c-109">若要自动答复所有邮件, 请执行以下操作:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a535c-110">转到</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="a535c-111">**"设置** > **查看所有 Outlook 设置** > **邮件** > **自动答复**打开您的[自动答复设置](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="a535c-112">选择 "**打开自动答复**" 切换。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="a535c-113">选中 "**仅在某段时间内发送答复**" 复选框使您能够:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a535c-114">仅在选择时发送答复。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a535c-115">如果不设置时间段, 则自动答复将保持打开状态, 直到您关闭它。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a535c-116">阻止日历</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a535c-117">自动拒绝新邀请</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a535c-118">在此期间谢绝和取消我的会议</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="a535c-119">在 "消息" 框中, 键入离开时要发送给用户的消息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="a535c-120">若要仅将答复发送给你的联系人, 请选中 "**仅将答复联系人**" 复选框。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="a535c-121">选择“保存”\*\*\*\*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a535c-122">了解有关[Outlook.com 中自动转发的](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)详细信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a535c-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
